channel.title: Command Line on Bluish capsule
channel.description: Recent content in Command Line on Bluish capsule

item.title: Init git submodules
item.description: git submodule update --init --recursive git submodule update --recursive git submodule update --recursive --remote

item.title: Clean PowerShell history
item.description: Clear Windows 10 (Server 2016) history “feature” Remove-Item (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath Reset the console buffer ALT+F7 Clear PSReadline’s session history [Microsoft.PowerShell.PSConsoleReadLine]::ClearHistory() Clear PowerShell’s own history Clear-History Commands taken from this stackoverflow article

item.title: Compress pdf file with linux
item.description:
A pdf file with a lot of scanned images can be a very large file.

I reduced a file from 307MB to 68MB with limited quality loss.
